Gravitational Simulation ( Project Link )

This project is a gravitational simulation for a large number of light particles and a few heavy attractors. It was inspired originally by this video:

I originally wrote it in python with numpy, and used it to make animations both like the background you see (which is actually a rewrite in typescript to run in the browser) as well as visualizations showing which attractor each point ended up closest to. You can see the full browser-based simulation here.
